TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content: Wow, I feel sleeeeeeeeeeeeeeppppppppppppppyyyyyyyy.................

Wow, I feel sleeeeeeeeeeeeeeppppppppppppppyyyyyyyy.................

*grabs rebar out of tsar bomb*
*slips onto detonator and activates it*

Well there goes the town...

So would you still love pizza eating it outside the Amundsen-Scott station?

I would lose my face if I went outside to eat a pizzia. Forstbites Killer, literally.

Well there goes the town...

I would lose my face if I went outside to eat a pizzia. Forstbites Killer, literally.

But the important thing is, does it still taste nice?
Yes, yes it would.

*K.O.*

Hey, leave the RageBot alone! Chobit and I need it!

For what?

Also *Steals back rage097 and places it into another tsar bomba with motion activation.* Buyer collects!

You can build up a resistance to spicy foods like poison or alcohol till eating a raw JalapeÃƒÂ±o wouldn't effect you. That would be weird.

That must explain why I put about 5 tablespoons (I can't visualise centilitres, never seen a centilitre measure) of Tabasco Sauce on my pickled balogna. Y'know the "Hot" salsa they sell at shops? It's not hot.
*Kicks Rage097 and activats Tsar Bomba*

That must explain why I put about 5 tablespoons (I can't visualise centilitres, never seen a centilitre measure) of Tabasco Sauce on my pickled balogna. Y'know the "Hot" salsa they sell at shops? It's not hot.

You could apply this to everything, so if you die a bit every day would you become immune to dying?

Edit: ok, you are now dead rockcoole and I still have rage097 since he is tsar bomba proof *Stores him into a third bomba with motion trackers.*
Note: rage097 is invulnerable.
Yes. That means since you grow a little every day you stop growing around 25. Good job you're now imortal.
Yay !
Madness contained... successfully.
That tiny little can? It is too weak!

That must explain why I put about 5 tablespoons (I can't visualise centilitres, never seen a centilitre measure) of Tabasco Sauce on my pickled balogna. Y'know the "Hot" salsa they sell at shops? It's not hot.

Millilitres are more commonly used. 15 is about a tablespoon *cooks too much*
